name: openstack-exercise-part3
description: Exercise for OpenStack with University of Helsinki.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../../desktop/uni-helsinki-fi-mooc/part2/phonebook && npm run build && copy -r build ../openstack-exercise-part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Jay Indino
